This class is part of the Image Processing Library IPL98.

Returns :

bool ipl::CMaskOperation::BlurEightConnected3x3 (  CStdImage &    Img ) 
 

Blurs the image.

It is a speed optimized blur algorithm replacing each graytone by the simple average of the gray tones of central cell and 8 nearest pixels. BlurEightConnected3x3 operates on objects of class CImages or CByteImages. Edge pixels are calculated using a mirror image of the old edge pixels at the image edges.

Parameters:
Img  is the source-target image of type CImage or CByteImage
Returns :
False if Img is empty or have dimensions smaller than 4x4 or if Img does not have 8 bits/pixel
Version:
0.85
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

Definition at line 181 of file mask_operation.cpp.

References ipl::CText::AppendIPL(), ipl::CStdImage::GetTImagePtr(), ipl::CStdImage::m_History, TString::pChars, and ipl::CText::RemoveLastLine().

bool ipl::CMaskOperation::BlurFourConnected3x3 (  CStdImage &    Img ) 
 

Blurs the image.

It is a speed optimized blur algorithm replacing each graytone by the simple average of the gray tones of central cell and 4 nearest pixels. BlurFourConnected3x3 operates on opjects of class CImages and CByteImages. Edge pixels are calculated using a mirror image of the old edge pixels about the image edges.

Parameters:
Img  is the source-target image of type CImage or CByteImage
Returns :
False if Img is empty or have dimensions smaller than 4x4
Version:
0.85
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

bool ipl::CMaskOperation::Convolve (  CFloatImage &    Img,
const CFloatImage &    Mask
) 
 

Convolve calculates the convolution of Img and Mask.

Mask is always a float image. No dimension of Mask should exceed that of Img. Boundary conditions periodic with width and height of Img are assumed. Reference cell is (0,0) of Mask. Apply CopyDisplace or SetOrigo to Img in case another reference cell is desired.

Parameters:
Img  is the source-target image of class CFloatImage
Mask  is the mask image of class CFloatImage
Returns :
False if Img and/or Mask are empty or if the dimensions of Mask exceed thoso of Img
Version:
0.85
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

) 
 

calculates the convolution of Img and Mask.

Mask is always a float image. No dimension of Mask should exceed that of Img. Boundary conditions periodic with width and height of Img are assumed. Reference cell is (0,0) of Mask. Apply CopyDisplace or SetOrigo to Img in case another reference cell is desired.

bool ipl::CMaskOperation::Convolve (  CStdImage &    Source,
const CFloatImage &    Mask,
CIntImage &    Dest
) 
 

calculates the convolution of Source and Mask.

Mask is always a float image. No dimension of Mask should exceed that of Source. Boundary conditions periodic with width and height of Source are assumed. Reference cell is (0,0) of Mask. Apply CopyDisplace or SetOrigo to Img in case another reference cell is desired.

Parameters:
Source  is a pointer to the source image of class CImage or CByteImage
Mask  is the mask image of class CFloatImage
Dest  is the destination image of class CIntImage
Returns :
False if Source and/or Mask are empty or if the dimensions of Mask exceed those of *pSource
Version:
0.85
Author:

calculates the convolution of Img and Mask.

bool ipl::CMaskOperation::ConvolveFast (  CIntImage &    Img,
const CFloatImage &    Mask,
float    Prefactor
) 
 

ConvolveFast performs a convolutions of Source of class CIntImage using a 3x3 CFloatImage Mask.

The result is saved in a CIntImage. The mask must be a 3x3 image. The algorithm is very fast if the 8 non-center elements are 1 or 0. The prefactor can be used for achieving this. The reference cell is the center cell. Edge pixels in Dest are set to the same gray tone as the nearest neighbour non-edge pixel.

Parameters:
Img  is the source-target image of type CImage or CByteImage
Mask  is the 3x3 mask image of type TFloatImage
Prefactor  is a common prefactor scaling the image Dest
Returns :
False if Source is empty or if the dimensions of Mask is not 3x3
Version:
0.85
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

Definition at line 300 of file mask_operation.cpp.

References ipl::CText::AppendIPL(), ipl::CFloatImage::GetConstTFloatImagePtr(), ipl::CIntImage::GetTIntImagePtr(), ipl::CIntImage::m_History, TString::pChars, and ipl::CText::RemoveLastLine().

bool ipl::CMaskOperation::ConvolveFast (  CStdImage &    Source,
const CFloatImage &    Mask,
float    Prefactor,
CIntImage &    Dest
) 
 

ConvolveFast performs a convolutions of pSource using a 3x3 CFloatImage Mask.

The resultis saved in a CIntImage. The mask must be a 3x3 image. The algorithm is very fast if the 8 non-center elements are 1 or 0. The prefactor can be used for achieving this. The reference cell is the center cell. Edge pixels in Dest are set to the same gray tone as the nearest neighbour non-edge pixel. The history of Source is copied to Dest, old history in Dest is deleted.

Parameters:
Source  is the source-target image of class CIntImage
Mask  is the 3x3 mask image of class CFloatImage
Prefactor  is a common prefactor scaling the image Dest
Dest  is the destination image of class CIntImage
Returns :
False if Source is empty or if the dimensions of Mask is not 3x3 or if Source does not have 8 bits/pixel
Version:
0.85
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

Definition at line 270 of file mask_operation.cpp.

bool ipl::CMaskOperation::ConvolveFast (  CStdImage &    Img,
const CFloatImage &    Mask,
float    Prefactor
) 
 

ConvolveFast performs a convolutions of Img using a 3x3 CFloatImage Mask.

The (result % 256) is saved in a CImage or CByte image. The mask must be a 3x3 image. The algorithm is very fast if the 8 non-center elements are 1 or 0. The prefactor can be used for achieving this. The reference cell is the center cell. Edge pixels in Dest are set to the same gray tone as the nearest neighbour non-edge pixel.

Parameters:
Img  is the source-target image of type CImage or CByteImage
Mask  is the 3x3 mask image of class CFloatImage
Prefactor  is a common prefactor scaling the image Dest
Returns :
False if Img is empty or if the dimensions of pMask is not 3x3 or if Img does not have 8 bits/pixel
Version:
0.85
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

Definition at line 239 of file mask_operation.cpp.

References ipl::CText::AppendIPL(), ipl::CFloatImage::GetConstTFloatImagePtr(), ipl::CStdImage::GetTImagePtr(), ipl::CStdImage::m_History, TString::pChars, and ipl::CText::RemoveLastLine().

bool ipl::CMaskOperation::MaxGradientFast (  CIntImage &    Img,
float    Prefactor
) 
 

MaxGradientFast is an edge detecting algoritm.

It calculates the maximum absolute graytone difference of two opposite neigbour pixels over the 4 possible directions. Diagonal differences have weight 2/3. The result is stored. The gray tone of edge pixels are set to zero.

Parameters:
Img  is the source-target image of class CIntImage
Prefactor  is a common prefactor scaling the image Dest
Returns :
False if Img is empty
Version:
0.85
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

bool ipl::CMaskOperation::MaxGradientFast (  CStdImage &    Source,
float    Prefactor,
CIntImage &    Dest
) 
 

MaxGradientFast is an edge detecting algoritm.

It calculates the maximum absolute graytone difference of two opposite neighbour pixels over the 4 possible directions. Diagonal differences have weight 2/3. The result is stored in an integer image. The gray tone of edge pixels are set to zero.

Parameters:
Source  the source image of class CImage or CByteImage
Prefactor  is a common prefactor scaling the image Dest
Dest  is the destination image of class CIntImage
Returns :
False if *pSource is empty or if Source does not have 8 bits/pixel
Version:
0.85
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

) 
 

MaxGradientFast is an edge detecting algoritm.

It calculates the maximum absolute graytone difference of two opposite neighbour pixels over the 4 possible directions. Diagonal differences have weight 2/3. The result is stored. The gray tone of edge pixels are set to zero.

bool ipl::CMaskOperation::MedianFilterDiagonalConnected3x3 (  CIntImage &    Img ) 
 

takes the median of the graytone among the 5 pixels.

The pixels form a diagonal cross about each pixel. Edge pixels are unchanged.

Parameters:
Img  is the source-destination image of class CIntImage
Returns :
False if Source is empty

bool ipl::CMaskOperation::MedianFilterFourConnected3x3 (  CIntImage &    Img ) 
 

takes the median of the graytone among the 5 pixels.
